Magna Charta ecclesiæ universalis the grand charter issued out and granted by Jesus Christ for the plantation of the Christian faith in all nations ... / by George Lawson ... Lawson, George, d. 1678.
The second edition, corrected.
[6], 216 p.
Printed by T.M. for Jeremiah Lawson and are to be sold by Tho. Newborough, London : 1686.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
